title: Reimagining Urban Spaces: How Living Labs Drive City Regeneration
subtitle: Exploring the intersection of smart city technology and urban regeneration through participatory living lab approaches.
featuredImageAlt: Vibrant living labs illustration depicting urban regeneration through participatory community innovation
excerpt: Living labs are transforming how cities approach urban regeneration. By combining smart city technology with participatory design, communities are co-creating solutions that truly serve their needs.
